title: Product of Sine and Cosine
text: To evaluate, rewrite the product of sine and cosine as a sum or difference using the following formula: sin(a)cos(b)=1/2[sin(a+b)+sin(a-b)].

title: Identifying Unknown Angles
text: From the formula, what is the value of the unknown angle a?

title: Identifying Unknown Angles
text: From the formula, what is the value of the unknown angle $$b$$?

title: Evaluating the Product
text: Plug in the identified values of a and $$b$$ into the product-to-sum formula. Leave the answer unsimplified, including sine in the final answer.
